Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Litta Palace in Lainate (Fiera Milano Rho), you'll be minutes from Green Golf Club and close to Gaap Family-Club. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Villa Arconati and Bosco WWF di Vanzago.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an indoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby. Guests can catch a ride on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 6 km.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Lainate? This hotel has 3067 square feet (285 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Litta Palace in Lainate (Fiera Milano Rho), you'll be minutes from Green Golf Club and close to Gaap Family-Club. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Villa Arconati and Bosco WWF di Vanzago.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Green Golf Club - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Gaap Family-Club - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Villa Arconati - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Bosco WWF di Vanzago - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Fiera Milano Exhibition Center - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Teatro Giuditta Pasta - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Church of St Francis of Assisi - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Santuary of Our Lady of Miracles - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Saronno Hospital - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Legnano Hospital - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Parco del Lura - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Parco del Roccolo - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Castle Park Legnano - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Aqvasport Limbiate - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Chiesa di Sant Ambrogio - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Litta Palace is Milan (MXP-Malpensa Intl.) - 25.6 km / 15.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
